name: 3D Multiplayer Platformer
description:
From https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/821927583/.

INSTRUCTIONS:

☁️ 3D Multiplayer Platformer ☁️

Welcome!

The features:

- It's 3D! Play as if it is real life.

- 5 fabulous levels! You can remix and make your own!

- It's multiplayer! If you are a Scratcher and signed in, you can play with other Scratchers online!

- Game is 100% PEN! And no stamping!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse/Arrow Keys - Move Camera

Space to jump
